member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AdditionalPrompts.ExpiryDatePrompt
member.summary:
Whether expiry date needs to be prompted during manual entry.
Default is NoPrompt.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AdditionalPrompts.CvvPrompt
member.summary:
Whether CVV need to be prompted during manual entry.
Default is NoPrompt.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AdditionalPrompts.ZipCodePrompt
member.summary:
Whether Zip code need to prompted during manual entry.
Default is NoPrompt.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.MerchantDecision
member.summary:
Merchant decision to the current transaction.
Defalut is NoMerchantDecision.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.PinEncryptionType
member.summary: PIN encryption type. This field is effective only when ONLINE PIN is required.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.PinKeySlot
member.summary:
PIN key slot. This field is effective only when ONLINE PIN is required. Only support DUKPT key. Key slot number, start from 1. Default to 1.
Monitor(S80,S300,S500,SP30,D210): 1-40(DES DUKPT and Master Session).
Prolin(D200,D220, S920,Q20,Q30,Px5,Px7): 1-99 (DES DUKPT and Master Session), 1-40(AES DUKPT).
PayDroid(A60, A80, A920, A930, Aries Series): 1-99 (DES DUKPT and Master Session), 1-40(AES DUKPT).
Attribute: n...2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.PinMinLength
member.summary:
The PIN minimum length. This field is effective only when PIN entry is required. The value cannot be greater than the PIN maximum length and cannot be less than 4.
The default min length is 4.
Attribute: n...2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.PinMaxLength
member.summary:
The PIN maximum length. This field is effective only when PIN entry is required. The value cannot be lower than the PIN minimum length and cannot be greater than 12.
The default max length is 12.
Attribute: n...2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.PinBypass
member.summary:
Allow user to bypass the PIN. This field is effective only when PIN is required.
Default is NotAllowPinBypass.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.PinAlgorithm
member.summary:
PIN algorithm. This field is effective only when ONLINE PIN is required.
Default is Iso9564_0.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.TagList
member.summary:
EMV tag list to be returned in EMV TLV data in response message.
Please see EMV Tags for Response of Authorize Card in Reference.
Example: Request for tag 0x9F26 0x9F27 0x4F, then this field would be: "9F269F274F".
Cannot request the following sensitive tags:
0x56: track 1 data
0x57: track 2 equivalent data
0x5A: PAN
0x9F1F: track1 discretionary data
0x9F6B: track 2 data(MasterCard Only)
0x9F20: track 2 discretionary data
Attribute: an...1024

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.Timeout
member.summary:
Timeout in 100ms for waiting PIN entry. Valid value should be[0, 3000]. The value of "" or 0 means waiting till user canceled or confirmed.
Attribute: n...4

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.PinpadType
member.summary: Pinpad type. Default is "InternalPinpad". "ExternalPinpad" and "ExternalPinpadFirst" are for A80 only. If used on another device, it will return param error.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.KsnFlag
member.summary:
Indicate whether to increase KSN, when MAC key type is 1(DUKPT Key).
Default is Increase.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardRequest.Title
member.summary:
The title that to be displayed, default as "Amount: $0.00".
Attribute: ans...36

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.CompleteOnlineEmvRequest.OnlineAuthorizationResult
member.summary: Online authorization result. Indicate the result of online authorization.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.CompleteOnlineEmvRequest.ResponseCode
member.summary:
Response Code. Host authorization response code, tag 8A.
i.e. Contact tag 8A:
Y1: Offline approved
Y3: Unable to go online, offline approved
Z1: Offline declined
Z3: Unable to go online, offline declined
Other: Online approved or declined
Attribute: ans2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.CompleteOnlineEmvRequest.AuthorizationCode
member.summary:
Host authorization code. EMV tag 89. Value generated by the authorization authority for an approved transaction.
Attribute: ans6

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.CompleteOnlineEmvRequest.IssuerAuthenticationData
member.summary:
If issuer authentication data (tag 91) is returned by host, it shall be set to terminal.
Attribute: ans...32

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.CompleteOnlineEmvRequest.IssuerScript1

If issuer script (tag 71) is returned by host, it shall be set to terminal.
Attribute: ans...1024

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.CompleteOnlineEmvRequest.IssuerScript2
member.summary:
If issuer script (tag 72) is returned by host, it shall be set to terminal.
Attribute: ans...1024

EMV tag list to be returned in EMV TLV data in response message.
Please see EMV Tags for Response of Authorize Card in Reference.
Example: Request for tag 0x9F26 0x9F27 0x4F, then this field would be: "9F269F274F".
Cannot request the following sensitive tags:

0x57: track 2 equivalent data

0x9F6B: track 2 data(MasterCard Only)
0x9F20: track 2 discretionary data

member.summary:
List of requested tags. All the tags are consecutive without any separator.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.GetPinBlockRequest.AccountNumber
member.summary:
Account Number.
The length of the account number must from 13 to 19. It is required when the "PinAlgorithm" is set to Iso9564_0 or Iso9564_3.
This value should be masked PAN returned from the response of "InputAccountWithEmv" when the encryption is on.
Attribute: ans...19

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.GetPinBlockRequest.KeySlot
member.summary:
Key slot number, start from 1. Default to 1.
Monitor(S80,S300,S500,SP30,D210): 1-40(DES DUKPT and Master Session).
Prolin(D200,D220, S920,Q20,Q30,Px5,Px7): 1-99 (DES DUKPT and Master Session), 1-40(AES DUKPT).
PayDroid(A60, A80, A920, A930, Aries Series): 1-99 (DES DUKPT and Master Session), 1-40(AES DUKPT).
Attribute: n...2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.GetPinBlockRequest.PinMinLength
member.summary:
The value must be not less 4, and must be not more than pin max length. Default to 4.
Attribute: n...2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.GetPinBlockRequest.PinMaxLength
member.summary:
The value must be not less pin min length, and must be not more than 12. Default to 12.
Attribute: n...2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.GetPinBlockRequest.Timeout
member.summary:
Timeout in 100ms for waiting PIN entry. Valid value should be [0, 3000]. The value of "" or 0 means waiting till user canceled or confirmed.
Attribute: n...4

member.summary:
The title that to be displayed, default as "Amount: $0.00".

member.summary: Pinpad type. Default is "InternalPinpad". "ExternalPinpad" and "ExternalPinpadFirst" are for A80 only. If used on another device, it will return param error.

Indicate whether to increase KSN, when MAC key type is 1(DUKPT Key).

member.summary: Contactless Pinpad Type Flag. This parameter is valid only when contactlessPinpadEnableFlag is Allowed.

member.summary: Whether contact EMV entry is allowed.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.ContactEmvPinpadTypeFlag
member.summary: Contact EMV Pinpad Type Flag. This parameter is valid only when contactEmvPinpadEnableFlag is Allowed.

member.summary: Whether fallback swipe is allowed after reading EMV card failed.

member.summary:
Whether laser scanner entry is allowed.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.FrontCameraFlag
member.summary:
Whether front camera entry is allowed.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.EncryptionFlag
member.summary:
Data Encryption flag.
Default is NotEncrypted. In BroadPOS P2PE, this field is mandatory and can not set to NotEncrypted.
The application will convert it from hexadecimal binary array into an ASCII string. For example, the 3 bytes binary array 0x1a 0x23 0xd4 can be converted into "1a23d4".

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.KeySlot
member.summary:
Data Encryption key slot number, start from 1. For Encryption Flag as 1, 2, 5, 6:
Monitor(S80,S300,S500,SP30,D210): 1-40(DES DUKPT and Master Session).
Prolin(D200,D220, S920,Q20,Q30,Px5,Px7): 1-99 (DES DUKPT and Master Session), 1-40(AES DUKPT).
PayDroid(A60, A80, A920, A930, Aries Series): 1-99 (DES DUKPT and Master Session), 1-40(AES DUKPT).
Attribute: n...2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.PaddingChar
member.summary:
This is used to indicate what value needs to pad on data string before encryption.
0: padding 0x00.
F: padding 0xFF.
Only valid when EncryptionFlag is DukptTripleDesKeyWithCbcMode, DukptTripleDesKeyWithEcbMode or DesOrTdesMethod.
Attribute: an1

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.TrackDataSentinel
member.summary:
This is used to indicate the response track 1 and track 2 data whether need to include start and end sentinels for magnetic swipe transaction.
Default is NeedNotToIncludeStartAndEndSentinel.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.MinAccountLength
member.summary:
MIN account length. Default to 10. Valid value [1, 32]. Manual Entry only
Attribute: n...2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.MaxAccountLength
member.summary:
MAX account length. Default to 19. Valid value [1, 32].
Attribute: n...2

EMV tag list to be returned in EMV TLV data in response message.
Please see EMV Tags for Response of Authorize Card in Reference.
Example: Request for tag 0x9F26 0x9F27 0x4F, then this field would be: "9F269F274F".
Cannot request the following sensitive tags:
0x56: track 1 data
0x57: track 2 equivalent data
0x5A: PAN
0x9F1F: track1 discretionary data
0x9F6B: track 2 data(MasterCard Only)

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.Timeout
member.summary:
Timeout in 100ms for waiting account entry. Valid value should be [200, 9999].
Attribute: n...4

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.FallbackInsertPinpadEnableFlag
member.summary: Whether fallback insert is allowed after reading contactless card failed.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.KsnFlag
member.summary:
Indicate whether to increase KSN, when MAC key type is 1(DUKPT Key).
Default is Increase.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.CustomData
member.summary:
Custom data string to be encrypted, used to define any special formats for sensitive data.
Custom data must be in hexadecimal format. Placeholder strings should not be converted to hex.
Placeholder format:
${ PARAMETER_NAME }
${ VARIABLE_NAME, FORMAT, PADLEN}
PARAMETER_NAME - Parameter name, optional values:TRACK1DATA, TRACK2DATA, TRACK3DATA.
VARIABLE_NAME - Variable name, optional values:TRACK1LEN, TRACK2LEN, TRACK3LEN.
FORMAT - The format of track data length, optional values:HEX.
PADLEN - The number of padding bytes.
Example: Original string = "pq${TRACK2DATA}abc"
Convert custom string to hex = "7071${TRACK2DATA}616263"

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvRequest.FallbackToManualPinpadEnableFlag
member.summary: Whether fallback to manual is allowed after reading swipe card failed. MagneticSwipePinpadEnableFlag must be Allowed.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.SetEmvTlvDataRequest.EmvTlvData
member.summary:
EMV TLV data will be returned in consecutive TLV format data based on the Tag List filed in the request message.
Please see EMV Tags for Response of Authorize Card in Reference.
All the EMV TLV data shall be expanded to double length.
e.g. AID (A0 00 00 00 04 10 10): "4F07A0000000041010", Cardholder Name ("JACK"): "5F20044A41434B".
Attribute: ans...1024

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardResponse.AuthorizationResult
member.summary: Authorization result. Indicate the transaction result after 1st GAC.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardResponse.SignatureFlag
member.summary: Signature flag. Indicates if signature is needed.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardResponse.PinBlock
member.summary:
The pin block value. This field is effective only when the CVM type ONLINE PIN is applied.
Attribute: ans...16

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardResponse.Ksn
member.summary:
The KSN value for online PIN encryption. This field is effective only when the CVM type ONLINE PIN is applied.
Attribute: ans...20

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.AuthorizeCardResponse.EmvTlvData
member.summary:
EMV TLV data will be returned in consecutive TLV format data based on the Tag List filed in the request message.
Please see EMV Tags for Response of Authorize Card in Reference.
All the EMV TLV data shall be expanded to double length.
e.g. AID (A0 00 00 00 04 10 10): "4F07A0000000041010", Cardholder Name ("JACK"): "5F20044A41434B".
The following sensitive tags will NOT be included:
0x56: track 1 data
0x57: track 2 equivalent data
0x5A: PAN
0x9F1F: track1 discretionary data
0x9F6B: track 2 data(MasterCard Only)
0x9F20: track 2 discretionary data
Attribute: ans...1024

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.CompleteOnlineEmvResponse.AuthorizationResult
member.summary:
Indicate the transaction result after 2nd GAC.
Indicate the transaction result for partial EMV only: PartialEmvApprove and PartialEmvDecline.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.CompleteOnlineEmvResponse.EmvTlvData
member.summary:
EMV TLV data will be returned in consecutive TLV format data based on the Tag List filed in the request message.
Please see EMV Tags for Response of Authorize Card in Reference.
All the EMV TLV data shall be expanded to double length.
e.g. AID (A0 00 00 00 04 10 10): "4F07A0000000041010", Cardholder Name ("JACK"): "5F20044A41434B".
The following sensitive tags will NOT be included:
0x56: track 1 data
0x57: track 2 equivalent data
0x5A: PAN
0x9F1F: track1 discretionary data
0x9F6B: track 2 data(MasterCard Only)
0x9F20: track 2 discretionary data
Attribute: ans...1024

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.CompleteOnlineEmvResponse.IssuerScriptResults
member.summary:
Issuer script results, HEX format.
Attribute: an...512

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.GetEmvTlvDataResponse.EmvTlvData
member.summary:
If contact EMV card is read successfully, some related EMV data will be returned in consecutive TLV format data.
Note: All the EMV TLV data shall be expanded to double length.
e.g,1 AID(A0 00 00 00 04 10 10) "\x4F\x07\xA0\x00\x00\x00\x04\x10\x10": "4F07A0000000041010",
2 Cardholder Name ("JACK") "\x5F\x20\x04\x4A\x41\x43\x4B": "5F20044A41434B".
Only return the following flags if the application is Termlink or if the PAN is in whitelist:
0x56:track 1 data
0x57:track 2 equivalent data
0x5A:PAN
0x9F1F:track 1 discretionary data
0x9F26:application cryptogram
0x9F20:track 2 discretionary data
Attribute: ans...1024

member.summary:
The PIN block value.
Attribute: ans...16

All the EMV TLV data shall be expanded to double length.
e.g. AID (A0 00 00 00 04 10 10): "4F07A0000000041010", Cardholder Name ("JACK"): "5F20044A41434B".
The following sensitive tags will NOT be included:
0x56: track 1 data

0x9F1F: track1 discretionary data

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvResponse.LuhnValidationResult
member.summary:
If terminal not support, this field is empty. Otherwise, it will use following value.
Please note:
1. Not all card support Luhn. So please make sure the card support Luhn before you use this field. If the card not support Luhn, this value is invalid.
2. Terminal will verify Luhn only when entry mode is Manual or Swipe.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.FullIntegration.InputAccountWithEmvResponse.CustomEncryptedData
member.summary: An array of encrypted strings representing custom encrypted data.

e.g. Request for tag 0x9F26 0x9F27 0x4F, then this field would be: "9F269F274F'.
Attribute: ans...1024

member.name: M:POSLinkFullIntegration.POSLinkFull.GetPOSLinkFull
member.summary: SDK entry function. You must call this function to get a POSLink2 object before you use any functions. SDK will do some initialization operations in this function.

member.name: M:POSLinkFullIntegration.POSLinkFull.GetTerminal(POSLinkCore.CommunicationSetting.CommunicationSetting)
member.summary:
Create or get exist terminal based on communication Setting.
If specify a commSetting not used yet, it will create a new terminal instance.
If specify a same commSetting, it will return the instance has been created.

member.name: M:POSLinkFullIntegration.POSLinkFull.RemoveTerminal(POSLinkFullIntegration.Terminal)
member.summary: Remove terminal based on communication Setting.

member.name: T:POSLinkFullIntegration.Terminal
member.summary: Terminal entry class. All operations for the terminal are done through this class.

member.name: M:POSLinkFullIntegration.Terminal.Cancel
member.summary:
Cancel the operation currently being performed on the terminal
Please note: It not cancel function call.

returns.para: 5: Ready for Signature retry by pressing CLEAR key.
6: Ready for PIN retry by inputting wrong offline PIN for EMV.
9000004: Ready for second card input (For REPLACE/MERGE). (Same as 4)
9000005: Ready for Signature retry by pressing CLEAR key. (Same as 5)
9000006: Ready for PIN retry by inputting wrong offline PIN for EMV. (Same as 6)

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.CustomMacInformationRequest.KeyType
member.summary: The type of the key which is used to calculate MAC value.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.CustomMacInformationRequest.WorkMode
member.summary: MAC calculation mode. SHA1 and SHA256 is HMAC only.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.CustomMacInformationRequest.KeySlot
member.summary:
Key slot for encryption. For HMAC, can be empty or 1. Empty value means key slot 1 too. Other MAC types, it can be in range [1, 99].
Attribute: n...2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.CustomMacInformationRequest.Data
member.summary:
Data to be encrypted. Must be in hexadecimal format before hash.
If need to hash sensitive card data, please use place holder in the format: ${VARIABLE_NAME}.
VARIABLE_NAME valid values: All the VARIBLE in Custom Data.
CUSTOMDATA – It can be a replacement for the data in Custom Data field.

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.TerminalConfiguration.EmvKernelConfigurationSelection
member.summary:
EMV kernel configuration selection.
Please refer to POSLink - Reference - EMV Kernel Configuration Type.
Please note that this is only valid for EMV contact transaction during authorize card.
Attribute: n2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.TerminalConfiguration.TransactionDate
member.summary:
9A: Transaction Date (use terminal date by default). Format is YYMMDD.
Attribute: n6

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.TerminalConfiguration.TransactionTime
member.summary:
9F21: Transaction Time (use terminal time by default) format is HHMMSS.
Attribute: n6

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.TerminalConfiguration.CurrencyCode
member.summary:
5F2A: Transaction Currency Code. ("840" by default)
Attribute: n3

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.TerminalConfiguration.CurrencyExponent
member.summary:
5F36: Transaction Currency Exponent. ("02" by default)
Attribute: n...2

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.TerminalConfiguration.MerchantCategoryCode
member.summary:
9F15: Merchant Category Code. ("0001" by default)

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.TerminalConfiguration.TransactionCvmLimit
member.summary:
Configure the limit value of CVM for current transaction. (Only for Visa payWave and only for command Input Account with EMV).

Attribute: ans...32

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.AdditionalAccountResponse.ServiceCode

Attribute: n...3

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.AdditionalAccountResponse.CvvCode
member.summary:
The CVV code, will be encrypted if the data encryption is enabled.
Each card brand may name the CVV differently, below is the definition:
Visa: CVV2, Length: 3
MasterCard: CVC2, Length: 3
American Express: CID, Length: 4
Discover: CID, Length: 3
JCB: CAV2, Length: 3
Diners: CVV2, Length: 3
Attribute: n...4

member.name: P:POSLinkFullIntegration.Util.CustomMacDataResponse.Ksn
member.summary:
KSN for MAC (returned when DUKPT key was used).
Attribute: ans…24
